Name: Website Scraping and Search Box Implementation Developer
Task: We are seeking a highly responsive and versatile developer to assist in scraping data from a specific website. The project involves creating a search box that allows users to filter out irrelevant information from source site while making sekected data accessible. The ideal candidate must be responsive and can turn project around in 2 days - have experience with web scraping techniques and a strong understanding of user interface design. this is just a test to find a good long term developer to join my global team.

Name: DevOps/Infrastructure Engineer Needed for Web Scraping Deployment on GCP
Task:
Seeking a DevOps or Infrastructure Engineer for a consultation on deploying a web scraping script in a GCP cloud environment. 
The script should run at regular intervals and store the results in cloud storage.
